title: Further Electrical, Electronic and Digital Principles
detectedTitle: Further Electrical, Electronic and Digital Principles

learningOutcomes.description: Solve a range of electrical and electronic problems by applying appropriate circuit theorems and mathematical methods
Apply appropriate methods to analyse and solve three-phase network problems
Examine analogue and digital circuits using appropriate laboratory and simulation techniques
Explain the characteristics of non-linear circuits to predict their behaviour under a variety of conditions
